entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Sunny this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 11 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 09:12 AM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 60%
